body.name: Seat Cushion - Memory Foam Cushion for Office Chair, Car Seat, Airplane, Bleacher - Sciatica & Hip & Coccyx Pain Relief Desk Chair Cushion for Long Sitting Office Workers, Car Drivers

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Premium Memory Foam】★Our office chair seat cushion is made of 100% pure memory foam, soft and firm, uses your own body heat to adapt to your curves, ergonomic "U" shaped hollow design for superior comfort, effectively support the coccyx, relieve the hip pressure caused by sitting for long periods.

【Convenience】★Non-slip rubber bottom keeps the butt pillow in place even when moving on the seat. The machine washable zippered breathable cover is easy to clean, just remove the cover and toss in the washing machine. Built-in handle for easy transport.

【Multiple Uses】★This office chair cushion supports the recovery of spinal problems such as back issues, disc herniation, coccyx injury, sciatica, etc. Large size (18.11''x14.17''x3.15'') fits all types of chairs, great for office chair, car seat, airplane seat, gaming chairs, bleacher, wheelchairs. Comfortable for business travel, sporting events, or elderly.

【Material Safety】★All parts of the seat cushion are certified safe and harmless for human health with no additives. The premium memory foam of this seat cushion quickly rebounds and returns to its original shape after each use and can be used to add height to any seat.
【Amazing Gift】★A amazing birthday or holiday gift for family, friends, workmates, grandparent and teenagers. Relieve sciatica, arthritis, lower back, buttocks, spine, butt, coccyx pain.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BREATHABLE FABRIC The cover of this seat cushion allows for greater ventilation to reduce sweating. MEMORY FOAM Memory foam can sense the memory curve of the human body, reduce the pressure on the tailbone, and promote healthy posture. ANTI-SLIP BOTTOM The bottom is made of non-slip rubber so that the cushion will not slide easily when in use.

MACHINE WASHABLE The cover of the seat cushion can be machine washed to keep it clean. PORTABLE Built-in handle, reinforced sewing, you can move the cushion at will. ZIPPER High-quality zipper is very smooth, allowing you to easily open the cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well. The cushion on my home office chair sucks, but it was expensive and it's a pretty new chair, so I'm not just getting rid of it.No butt pain after using this cushion all day. Doesn't slip or slide around. Folded in half, it fits in the bag I always use as a carry-on on flights. Can recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very functional cushion.
reviews.reviewText: Really like this cushion. Very comfortable, functional, lightweight, and appears to be durable. Recently had some back issues and this made sitting much more manageable. I actually purchased two of these, one for myself, and one for my spouse. The cushion has an easy to carry handle incorporated into the cover which is very handy. We take these with us when we travel and often use them at local eateries for improved seating. Would definitely recommend and purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ComfortMax Memory Foam Seat Cushion - A Must-Have for Extended Desk Work
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the ComfortMax Memory Foam Seat Cushion while using my computer, and it’s been a game-changer. This cushion, designed to be placed on a chair, offers exceptional comfort and support. Made from high-quality memory foam, it molds perfectly to the contours of my body, providing relief and reducing pressure on my lower back and hips.The ergonomic design is especially beneficial during long hours of sitting in front of the monitor. It helps in maintaining a good posture, which is crucial to avoid any strain or discomfort. The cushion’s cover is soft and breathable, ensuring that it doesn’t get too warm after prolonged use.Another great feature is its non-slip base, which keeps the cushion firmly in place on the chair. It’s also lightweight and portable, making it easy to move between different seating areas as needed.The cushion has a durable build and is easy to clean, thanks to its removable and washable cover. It’s a fantastic investment for anyone who spends a lot of time sitting, whether for work or leisure. The ComfortMax Memory Foam Seat Cushion has significantly enhanced my overall experience while using my monitor, and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I spend a lot of hours on both the computer and behind a video camera editing photos and video footage. It was delivered about 2 hours ago and I have already put it to use in my computer chair. It's great!! No more dead end! Nice and cushy and great support. I'm looking forward to when I can use it in the studio behind the video camera this weekend. The studio doesn't have the funding to purchase new chairs as of yet so this cushion will be a great help until the management can afford to buy new chairs for the video camera crew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plus Size Comfort!
reviews.reviewText: I am overweight ... according to "the charts", I am obese. I sit in my office chair roughly 8.5 hours a day. I was having shoulder, neck, tailbone, and lower back pain. My doctor suggested I try one of these. I no longer have lower back or neck pain. Shoulder pain is better but still a little bothersome. I think it is the way I type, not my posture ... anyway ... This cushion is great! It stays thick even after hours of sitting on it and the grippers on the bottom keep it from sliding on my leather chair! Absolutely has helped with my posture, too! It worked so well, I ended up with a full-length back support cushion for my chair too, and the two together have significantly decreased my Tylenol intake! If you spend multiple hours a day sitting and are experiencing tailbone, lower back, and/or neck pain - I highly recommend giving this a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have bought many items as I sit on my butt 8 hours a day and travel a few times a year. Any time I sit to long my butt aches. A friend recommended this cushion so I tried it out. It worked at first but that didn't last long. So now I rotate between my different cushions so the air comes back in them. Still trying to figure out my comfort as my butt is hurting right now writing this.Give it a try and see if it works for you.I am 5'7 at 161 lbs. I am not butt heavy. I actually have no fat in my butt at all. Maybe that's the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Without going into too much detail...
reviews.reviewText: My butt is quite happy now. This pillow is thicker and firmer than a lot of the donut types, and that makes it a little less comfortable to sit on. What you lost in comfort, you make up for in support. There is absolutely no weight on my...ahem...problem area when sitting on this pillow, and I like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It helps, but only so much when you have a spine injury
reviews.reviewText: I have some bulging discs in my lumbar region causing some reaaaaallly bad sciatica flares. Before it flared up this bad and I realized something was wrong it was mildly uncomfortable and I ordered this cushion hoping for relief hoping it’ll go away on its own. It did help to an extent, it takes the pressure off my tailbone which is very helpful, but because the nerve pain is affecting my whole right leg it doesn’t magically make it better and I’m still uncomfortable. But I can sit significantly more comfortably for a longer period of time. I’m hoping as I recover I’ll be able to appreciate this cushion more.When I was still able to work I toted this guy with me, the handle makes carrying it around a lot easier and my coworkers love it, I have to ask for it back several times 🌝I think getting a better chair to have underneath will help, I’m realizing I need lumbar support more than anything else but this is useful regardless
Not as soft or comfortable as I expected, but works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had a fall down the stairs bought one of these cushions brilliant used it in the house and car we went on a 7 hour car journey used my cushions no pain or discomfort Highley recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the cushion to go on an office chair. The colour was just what I wanted but as soon as I sat on it the cushion squashed down considerably. I am not heavy by any means and my wife who is only 7.5 stone also found the cushion unsupportive.Disapointed in the product and have returned it for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: The cushion I received was not the one advertised!
reviews.reviewText: It is not the size as stated on the ad, this one is a lot smaller. it is not very thick, less than 2 1/2 inches, so don't expect it to be much good at all. It also does not have a handle.
Necesitaba algo para mi silla de ruedas que fuera más cómodo Y además me elevó un poco y hasta el momento me ha servido mucho y está muy cómodo
